Description: Fragment of oval handle from neck join to sharp turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine buff-brown; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Name Leontidas. From the same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, MGR 288.32.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (176)
